about.title: Hi!
about.paragraph: Hello! I'm Atakan, a developer with a strong passion for technology and software development. My expertise lies in mobile app and web development. I'm constantly driven to learn new technologies and improve my projects.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you have any questions, project proposals, or collaboration ideas, feel free to reach out. I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Everything on this site is protected by the MIT license.

position.title: My current position
position.description: I'am not working any position right now :)

about.title: Personal About Page
about.description: A personal about page built with React.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase my skills and projects.

weather.title: Weather Application
weather.description: A simple weather application that uses the OpenWeatherMap API. It allows users to view weather information based on city and location.

todo.title: To-Do List Application
todo.description: A simple and user-friendly to-do list application. It allows users to add and manage tasks.
